title: apartment interior visualization
description: Develop a comprehensive interior design plan for a presentation apartment in a new residential complex, embodying a modern style. The design should maximize functionality and aesthetic appeal, showcasing clean lines, open spaces, and contemporary furnishings. Deliverables include mood boards, floor plans, 3D renderings, and a detailed presentation document. The goal is to create an inviting, stylish, and practical living space that appeals to prospective buyers and effectively showcases the apartment's potential.

title: minimal interior visualization
description: Develop a simple interior design project for an apartment in a new residential complex, focusing on organizing the living room into functional zones in a loft style. The design should highlight open spaces, industrial elements, and distinct zones using a neutral color palette and minimalist furnishings. Deliverables include mood boards, floor plans, and 3D renderings to present a stylish, practical living space that appeals to prospective buyers and showcases the apartment's potential.

title: Senart Cup U8 photosession
description: Experience the perfect blend of modern style and vibrant energy in this interior design visualization. This apartment features sleek, contemporary furnishings accentuated by bold yellow hues. The dynamic color palette, paired with minimalist decor, creates a lively and inviting atmosphere, ideal for those seeking a chic and spirited living space.

title: mini loft interior visualization
description: Develop a simple interior design project for a small studio apartment in a new residential complex, showcasing a loft style. The design should emphasize open space, industrial elements, and multifunctional areas, using a neutral color palette and minimalist furnishings. Deliverables include mood boards, floor plans, and 3D renderings to present a stylish, practical living space that appeals to prospective buyers and effectively demonstrates the apartment's potential.

title: visualization of a small studio
description: Create a straightforward interior design plan for a small modern studio apartment in a new residential complex, featuring a sofa bed. The design should highlight open space, contemporary elements, and multifunctional zones, utilizing a neutral color palette and sleek furnishings. Deliverables include mood boards, layout diagrams, and 3D visualizations to present an attractive, functional living area that appeals to potential buyers and showcases the apartment's potential.
